item.description:
Never been here, but my friends say it's a great place. Interesting menus of coffee, tea, Euro-Asian food/drinks.

Special event Karaoke starting @10pm, but meeting w/people earlier. Inviting both the Karaoke & Coffee Talk group, so if you're not up for singing, we'll be up for talking, & vice versa Please RSVP w/time you'll attend.

Location is not downtown and Parking is free. Parking lot & street parking & after 8pm lots available in other business lot after their business hours (e.g. at a Laundry mat & near Burger King). If you have further info on parking details, please post.

537 Farmington Ave Hartford, CT 06105
www.mytisane.com
http://www.mytisane.c...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Asian who looks like a Phuc w/striped blue & maroon polo style tee.
item.name: Tisane Euro Asian Cafe
